title: 5 people shot, 1 hit by car outside nightclub
content:
MEMPHIS, TN (WMC) -
Someone shot five people and drove over another outside a nightclub in Hickory Hill on Saturday.
Police received a call to a bar located in the 6100 block of Mount Moriah Road. When they arrived they found six people injured in the parking lot.
Witnesses told police two groups of people shot at each other between a mid-2000 gray Chevrolet Impala or Nissan Maxima and a white Pontiac G6.
Four of the victims went to Regional Medical Center in critical condition, but were stabilized and soon released.
One victim went to Saint Francis hospital in critical condition; another went to Methodist South hospital and was released.
Police said no arrests have been made at this time.
This is an ongoing investigation.
